game.name: LISTEN 3
game.categories: Single-player, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You are Subject 3. Blind, trapped in a facility crawling with mutants. You have a weapon — but it runs on the same power you need to escape. Navigate like the blind: listen, feel, memorize — and make it out without wasting your last percent of energy.
